  • Constructor Details

    • ProfessorHomePageScene

      public ProfessorHomePageScene​(SceneManager sceneManager, Professor professor)
      Creates a new ProfessorHomePage scene. This scene will present various form using the carLayout on top of its center panel.
      Parameters:
      sceneManager - the listener of the events dispatched by ProfessorHomePage
      professor - the logged professor

  • Method Details

    • setupCentralPanel

      public void setupCentralPanel()
      Sets up the center panel and the card layout of the scene. It creates also the videoList element

    • setupRightPanel

      public void setupRightPanel()
      Sets the right panel and the detail panel on top of it

    • getMainPanel

      public javax.swing.JPanel getMainPanel()

    • listen

      public void listen​(Event event)
      Description copied from interface: Listener
      The listen method is overwritten from all classes that implement this interface. Each class will handle the Event that they receive and will act accordingly
      Specified by:
      listen in interface Listener
      Parameters:
      event - generic event received from a dispatch method of some other classes. This event can be extended in other subclasses in order to implement the polimorphysm.

    • checkPreviousSceneForVideoDismiss

      private void checkPreviousSceneForVideoDismiss()
      This method checks if there is the need to dismiss a video playing in the background

    • goToStatisticsPage

      private void goToStatisticsPage​(Video video)
      Present the statisticsPage related to the given video
      Parameters:
      video - the video for which to show the statistics

    • getProfessor

      public Professor getProfessor()

    • dispatchLogoutEvent

      public void dispatchLogoutEvent​(LogoutEvent event)
      If any video is currently playing it will be dismissed (actually, only the statistics pane will play the video) and then dispatch a new LogoutEvent to the above listeners.
      Parameters:
      event -

    • openNewVideoForm

      public void openNewVideoForm()
      Presents on top of the center panel a new addVideoForm

    • openVideoList

      public void openVideoList()
      Presents on top of the center panel a new videoList

    • addNewVideoToList

      public void addNewVideoToList​(Video video)
      add the given video to the videoList of the logged professor. Then it shows again the videoList on top of the center panel
      Parameters:
      video - the new video to add to the video list of the professor

    • removeVideoFromList

      public void removeVideoFromList​(Video video)
      Removes the given video from the videoList of the logged professor. Then it shows again the videoList on top of the center panel
      Parameters:
      video - the video to remove from the video list of the professor

    • openVideoListAfterUpdate

      public void openVideoListAfterUpdate​(Professor professor)
      This method opens the videoList panel after the current professor profile has been updated
      Parameters:
      professor - the updated instance of professor

    • openModifyVideoForm

      public void openModifyVideoForm​(Video video)
      Present a new modifyVideoForm on top of the center panel
      Parameters:
      video - the video whose parameters are to be modified

    • openUpdateProfileForm

      public void openUpdateProfileForm()
      Present a new updateProfile on top of the center panel
